sentences.sentence: It is a fact of some interest to the local historian and genealogist, nothing more.
sentences.translation: 这件事对本地的历史学家和家谱学家还有些兴趣，但没有其它什么了。

sentences.sentence: However, genealogist George Ott investigated the claim, failed to substantiate it and said he believes it to be false.
sentences.translation: 然而，系谱学者乔治·奥特(George Ott)进行了调查，并未找到证据证实，所以他认为这种说法不实。
